about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 175: WOTW Survivors 2

From blasted badlands and mysterious mountains of the post apocalyptic future another team of tenacious thrillseekers braves the unknown reaches! 27 assorted adventurers along with 27 headless bodies and 20 make their debut! A Hyena hybrid in heavy body armor stand shoulder to shoulder with their steely eyed crossbow sniper companions! There’s a perfect pairing of mysteriously mutated mercenaries waiting for your adventuring needs!
